allow ICMP from 192.168.173.101 to 192.168.173.103
allow ICMP from 192.168.173.103 to 192.168.173.101
allow TCP from 192.168.173.101 to 192.168.173.103
allow TCP from 192.168.173.103 to 192.168.173.101
allow ICMP from 192.168.173.101 to 192.168.173.104
allow ICMP from 192.168.173.104 to 192.168.173.101
